value.0: Greetings, <FirstName>. I have been told to provide whatever assistance I can in your mission to save Neverwinter
However, my magic is not of a healing nature. My skills are tied to the teleportation portal in this temple. Is there something I can do for you, <FirstName>?
You should speak with Fenthick. His healing powers are unmatched by any other in this temple.
Remember, you can always rest here in the Temple of Tyr. It is safe, free from plague.
My magic is tied to the teleportation portal you see in this room. I will teleport you to safely before you permanently die. Now, is there something else you need of me?
You are one of Neverwinter's most important agents. More commonly, I have been asked to keep watch and protect promising recruits from the academy.
Before your mission started, I casted a Word of Recall spell upon you, so that whenever you become mortally wounded I can immediately teleport you here to safety.
I can't do that, <FirstName>. You are too important. Neverwinter has need of your skills if we're ever to save it. We can't risk an untimely demise.
The spell doesn't require your presence. I simply needed to know your full name, which Sedos provided.
